External TMDA Resources

  • TMDA's Project Management Site at Sourceforge

  • The qmail Handbook contains a section describing TMDA

  • Vincent Danen has added a TMDA installation and configuration tutorial to Controlling spam under Mandrake Linux, Part 2

  • Lou Hevly has written a tutorial for installing TMDA with vpopmail

  • Gerardo Arnaez has written a qmail / Vpopmail / QmailAdmin / TMDA on Debian HOWTO

  • Robin Socha has written a Using Gnus with TMDA to reduce UCE HOWTO

  • Bill Duncan has written a TMDA plugin for the SquirrelMail webmail package.

  • Mate Wierdl has written tmda4ezmlm, a script that sets up TMDA for an ezmlm mailing list.

  • Brian Koontz has written tmda-ezplm, scripts to automate the management of the TMDA pending queue via e-mail.

  • Andrew St. Jean has written a Mail Setup Doc explaining how he uses TMDA with qmail and Courier IMAP.

  • Bhavesh Patel has written a TMDA for newbies guide.

  • The TMDA mailing lists are available as newsgroups courtesy of the Gmane mail <--> news gateway.

  • The TMDA mailing lists are archived at AIMS.
